channel.title: Changing the client's ip [paying $5 for help] [easy fix]
channel.description:
Hey everyone I need help for my server so people can connect with they download it.
I have changed the IP address in client.java multiple times and still noone can connect.
There are two spots to change the IP in client.java here they are:
if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals("127.0.0.1") || 1 == 1) { <--- first spot
//server = "127.0.0.1"; <--- second spot server = "127.0.0.1";
My no-ip is Lost-legacyV1.no-ip.biz if anyone puts this in the right spot and it works, leave me your paypal address so I can send you $5..
Thanks and you can also add my msn to do this via teamviewer: DillonX10@hotmail.com

item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

julie101:

Do you want $5 or not? I didn’t ask you to come troll my thread.

Obviously you’re an idiot,

[quote=“de dust89, post:1, topic:383457”] if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals("Lost-legacyV1.no-ip.biz") || 1 == 1) { 

      server = "Lost-legacyV1.no-ip.biz";

send money to iamashithead@yahoo.com as a gift (NO DISPUTES) kthnxbai[/quote]
You are an idiot too.

Read the rules, morons. I’m not trolling your thread. Your thread isn’t allowed in the first place.

item.title: Changing the client's ip [paying $5 for help] [easy fix]
item.dc:creator: @julie101 julie101
item.description:
@julie101 wrote:

Hey everyone I need help for my server so people can connect with they download it.

I have changed the IP address in client.java multiple times and still noone can connect.

There are two spots to change the IP in client.java here they are:

if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals(“127.0.0.1”) || 1 == 1) { <— first spot

//server = “127.0.0.1”; <— second spot
server = “127.0.0.1”;

My no-ip is Lost-legacyV1.no-ip.biz if anyone puts this in the right spot and it works, leave me your paypal address so I can send you $5…

Thanks and you can also add my msn to do this via teamviewer: DillonX10@hotmail.com
